Html:
Is there a way to compare an equipment set with a baseline set and show the deltas for character stats?  So if I setup a baseline profile, then equip a new cloak, I would see the new stats along with a the delta relative to the base profile i.e. "Stamina 100 (+10)"

Also, these forums are pretty bad.  I can't seem to find a search function and there is no categorization.

We're planning that sort of baseline comparison for Rawr 2.0

Regarding the forums, yeah, they're just what's provided by CodePlex. Most of our discussion about Rawr takes place on EJ or the Blizz forums.
